class description: "In Advanced Mechanics, students built on the concepts they first studied in their 9th grade physics classes by investigating more complex scenarios with more mathematical maturity. They began by reviewing the equations for kinematics and motion, used numerical methods to understand how non-constant forces can affect motion, and used video analysis software to run mechanical experiments. Then they transitioned into a study of rotational motion and torque before concluding with conservation laws. Some students chose to study some units with calculus, while others elected to study through trigonometry and algebra." - Taposhi
student attributes: Juju, you bring a great attitude to class, and you are always paying attention. You stuggle to complete some of the assignments because you were always too focused on how you could apply physics to football and failed to finish your work.
improvements: You should watch Khan academy videos about topics that interest you and do more practice problems so that you're more confident in your understanding.
closing remarks: With hardwork and determination I'm certain that you will be able to improve your grade. All you really need to do is finish the tests.

student attributes: Mark, you have really stepped up in this class! You had a very difficult time understanding the concepts initially, but with you hard work and determination you made great improvments.
improvements: You need to review your fractions, they'll be really helpful next semester, and you should read more of the explanations in the textbook.
closing remarks: If you keep improving at the rate you are, then your grade will continue to rise.

student attributes: Mason, you need to put more effort into this class! Half the time your camera isn't on! You have been very lazy with your homework and it has shown on your tests. You have a decent natural understanding of the concepts, but that understanding has not grown at all throughout the semester.
improvements: You need to do more practice problems to solidify your understanding of different topics and you should spend more time listening during groups discussions.
closing remarks: If you pull yourself together and start putting in more effort, you should be able to improve your grade considerably.

student attributes: Veronika, you clearly have not payed attention at all this year. I actaully have no idea what you look like because you have never turned your camera on once. I constantly have to reach out to you about getting your homework in and you still sometimes get it in late.
